name: Dark Fear Survival
description:
Hello Everyone. My name is Burak Yiğitcan Baştuğ. I am developing a survival game. You can collect items in your inventory, craft another items with them and build your home where you want. You can walk under the darkness of night.  You can  swim and sleep also. Game is under development and ı will update new versions of this game. Have fun.

Thank you playing my game
